overview: Carol and Susan are avid nudists, so when Carol's rich father takes a trip to South America, she and Susan decide to take his yacht on a cruise with an unsuspecting friend down the Atlantic coast to visit various cities and nudist camps.
tagline: Three very gorgeous Eves on a slow-boat to... every nature camp along the way... with the cutest crew to ever sail the seven seas!
title: Have Figure, Will Travel
